title: reconnect again and again
body: 11:00 more than a man-machine , dropped, and have not connected, but the network is intact condition and the firewall also is not problem. Request for help

replies.body: Are you able to connect now?
today,i am not connect again. i think the system which has some problems. but this problem just once in a way.

I ask because you originally posted this at a time Riot were having some server issues.

Now we can troubleshoot more easily. Did this start to happen ever since a particular patch, or is this a long-standing issue? Who's your ISP and what's your OS? What have you tried thus far?
